ValidationRule.description: GTMS-25748: Added "Approved by Leader" to the condition. GTMS-26936: Updated as part of partners H1 project GTMS-29032: Updated validation condition to throw error when PAM Reviewed deal registration and sales program type value is empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Deal_Registration', AND( ISBLANK(Sales_Program_Type__c), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Partner_Program__r.SalesProgramType__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Partner_Program_Enrollment__r.SalesProgramType__c)) ), ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'PAM Reviewed') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please update "Sales Program Type" value at respective "Partner Program" and "Partner Program Enrollment" before approving.
